Title: Permits political subdivisions and municipal corporations of the state to set the residency requirements for certain positions
Summary: Permits political subdivisions and municipal corporations of the state to set the residency requirements for public officer positions.
LawCode: Amd ยง3, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to permitting political subdivisions and municipal corporations of the state to set the residency requirements for certain positions
